sourcesContent:
No. {{element.position}} Curso {{ course.name }} Categoria {{ course.category }}
import { Course } from './../model/course'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.scss'] }) export class CoursesComponent { courses: Course[] = []; displayedColumns = ['name','category'] }
